page.title: 12BILLERICAY NW Religion
page.content: {Billericay Baptist Church}was built in 1968. There are two services on Sundays at 10.00am and 7.00pm. The morning service is the more popular, attracting a congregation of about 250 people. The church has several youth groups, whose members ages range from 3_18yr. There is a weekly Bible Club and a monthly meeting for ladies. The church has had three ministers since its opening. It also has three Elders and six Deacons who assist in the running of the church. { Christchurch,}Perry St; is a C of E church in the Parish of Billericay. It is under the pastoral care of a team of clergy led by a Rector. There are 500 people on the electoral role. It is a wooden,rectangular brick building with a hall and various ante-rooms, which are used for a variety of group activities.
